text: Rheintal (English: Rhine Valley) is a district of the canton of St. Gallen in Switzerland. It contains the following municipalities: * Altstätten * Au * Balgach * Berneck * Diepoldsau * Eichberg * Marbach * Oberriet * Rebstein * Rheineck * Rüthi * St. Margrethen * Widnau Category:Rheintal (Wahlkreis)
title: Rheintal (Wahlkreis)
